fr.ufc.l3info.oprog

Interface Card

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MyCard

    public interface Card
    Simplified interface of a credit card.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkPin(int p)
      Checks the current pin of the card vs. the one in parameter.
      Account getAccount()
      Retrieves the bank account associated to the card.
      boolean isBlocked()
      Indicates whether the card is blocked or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccount

        Account getAccount()
        Retrieves the bank account associated to the card.
        Returns:
        the account associated to the card.

      • isBlocked

        boolean isBlocked()
        Indicates whether the card is blocked or not.
        Returns:
        true if the card is blocked, false otherwise.

      • checkPin

        boolean checkPin(int p)
        Checks the current pin of the card vs. the one in parameter.
        Parameters:
        p - the pin to check
        Returns:
        true if the pin are equal, false otherwise.
